column1: @entity3 wants to play with his dog, @entity0. @entity3 finds the ball. He throws the ball across the yard. @entity0 runs after the ball. @entity0 brings the ball back to @entity3. @entity3 plays fetch with @entity0 for a long time. @entity3 now wants to @entity0 for a walk. He looks for @entity0's leash. He looks on the porch. He looks in the closet. He looks on the hooks by the front door. @entity3 finally finds the leash in the kitchen drawer. @entity3 puts the leash on @entity0 and leads him out the front gate. @entity3 is not sure where he wants to go. He thinks about taking @entity0 around the block. He thinks about taking @entity0 to the pet store for a treat. He thinks about visiting his friend. He finally knows where to go. He takes @entity0 to the park. He sees his friends, @entity2. @entity1, and @entity4, at the park. They are all friends but @entity3 likes @entity1 the best.  @entity3 has a great time playing with @entity0 at the park. They play with a Frisbee. They chase in other and roll on the ground. @entity0 is very dirty when they got home. @entity3 has to give @entity0 a bath in the tub.
on the hooks by the front door
